Sentencas: Coal gasification is being developed as a technique for clean and effective use of coal, especially low-rank coal.
Titulo: Microstructure, performance and stability of Ni/Al2O3 cermet-supported SOFC operating with coal-based syngas produced using supercritical water

Sentencas: Supercritical water (SCW) gasification has high gasification efficiency at low temperature and can operate directly with wet coal without drying.
Titulo: Microstructure, performance and stability of Ni/Al2O3 cermet-supported SOFC operating with coal-based syngas produced using supercritical water

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) appear to be an important technology in future as they operate at high efficiency.
Titulo: Microstructure, performance and stability of Ni/Al2O3 cermet-supported SOFC operating with coal-based syngas produced using supercritical water

Sentencas: Therefore, the combination of coal gasification using supercritical water with a SOFC could represent one of the most highly efficient applications for the utilization of coal.
Titulo: Microstructure, performance and stability of Ni/Al2O3 cermet-supported SOFC operating with coal-based syngas produced using supercritical water

Sentencas: In this paper, syngas with the similar compositions from coal gasification by SCW was used for SOFC operation.
Titulo: Microstructure, performance and stability of Ni/Al2O3 cermet-supported SOFC operating with coal-based syngas produced using supercritical water

Sentencas: A Ni-Al2O3 cermet supported tubular SOFC was fabricated by thermal spraying for the performance test.
Titulo: Microstructure, performance and stability of Ni/Al2O3 cermet-supported SOFC operating with coal-based syngas produced using supercritical water

Sentencas: The influence of syngas on the performance of the tubular SOFC was investigated.
Titulo: Microstructure, performance and stability of Ni/Al2O3 cermet-supported SOFC operating with coal-based syngas produced using supercritical water

Sentencas: The maximum output power density decreased by about 34% as the fuel changed from hydrogen to the syngas at a test temperature of 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Microstructure, performance and stability of Ni/Al2O3 cermet-supported SOFC operating with coal-based syngas produced using supercritical water

Sentencas: The open circuit voltage of the tubular SOFCs presented a trend of a slight decrease with the increase of operating time and the output power density exhibited a trend of increase with the increase of operating time.
Titulo: Microstructure, performance and stability of Ni/Al2O3 cermet-supported SOFC operating with coal-based syngas produced using supercritical water
